# Week 6 (2019-12-06)

_subject to change_


## Objective

At the end of this lesson, learners will be able to:

1. Explain the use of statistical models in data analysis,

2. Demonstrate the necessary R script to build a simple model,

3. Explain why iteration is a cornerstone of programming, 

4. Understand the fundamental differences between the R and Python ecosystems, and

5. Write a script in Python to summarize a familiar data table.
